title: Škoda Karoq, Elroq and now Kamiq released as 130 Years Editions
content:
JOINING THE KAROQ 130 YEARS EDITION and Elroq 130 Years Edition in celebrating the brand’s 130-year history, Škoda is introducing the Kamiq 130 Years Edition, launching in November 2025 at $44,990 (plus on road costs) and bringing a wealth of specification inclusions. 

The Škoda Kamiq 130 Years Edition shares the Monte Carlo’s 110kW, 250Nm 1.5-litre turbocharged petrol engine and seven-speed automatic transmission, offering exceptional fuel consumption and one of the highest torque figures among front-wheel drive compact SUVs. This powerful and sporty – yet efficient – powertrain combines with a luxurious level of specification that builds further on both the Kamiq Select and Kamiq Monte Carlo.

Headlining the exterior changes over the Kamiq Select are 19-inch ‘Fornax’ alloy wheels in a silver finish, tinted side rear and rear windows, chrome roof rails and window surrounds, matrix LED headlights (low/high beam) with dynamic cornering, power tailgate with Virtual Pedal, and a unique “130 Years” special edition badge on tailgate.

Inside, the Kamiq 130 Years Edition combines luxury features usually reserved for the segment above, including a 9.2-inch touchscreen infotainment system with navigation, wireless phone charging, a 10-inch Virtual Cockpit, CANTON sound system with 10 speakers, leather- and Alcantara-appointed seat trim, heated steering wheel with paddle shifters, power-adjusting driver seat (including power lumbar) with memory, heated front and rear outboard seats, push button start, auto-dimming rear view mirror and LED ambient interior lighting.

Škoda’s leading Travel Assist (which incorporates adaptive cruise control, Adaptive Lane Assist and Emergency Assist) and nine airbags are also standard for added peace of mind.

Also included in the Kamiq 130 Years Edition are those clever solutions that make a Škoda a Škoda, such as a storage net under the parcel shelf, double sided boot mat (rubber/fabric) cargo net for the boot, a removable storage box for rear passengers and a waste bin in the front door pocket.

Four colours will be offered from launch on the Kamiq 130 Years Edition: Moon White metallic, Graphite Grey metallic, Race Blue metallic, and Black Magic pearlescent. All paint options are included at no additional cost on the Kamiq 130 Years Edition.

Škoda Australia Product Manager, Glenn Reid, said the Kamiq 130 Years Edition is the perfect complement to the 130 Years Edition variants of the Karoq and Elroq, with its premium specification inclusions and distinctive looks.

“The Kamiq 130 Years Edition continues the celebration of Škoda’s long and rich history with a car that showcases just how far the brand has come since it made its first Škoda bicycle in 1895. From those humble beginnings now comes a small SUV that’s cleverly packaged, more generously equipped than ever and designed with a restrained, European elegance,” Mr. Reid said.

“Add to that the reassurance of Škoda’s seven-year, unlimited kilometre warranty – unique amongst European brands – Škoda Choice Guaranteed Future Value, and affordable servicing, and there has never been a better opportunity to discover what makes the critically-acclaimed Kamiq the smart choice in its segment.”

The Kamiq 130 Years Edition is available to order now from Škoda dealers, with customer deliveries commencing in November 2025.
